text:
@PressSec Your boss said #COVID19 was a hoax, that it will magically dissapeared one day, didn't use mask, asked his followers and people in the administration to cut the bs and use masks to slow the spread of the virus. 
You are not sorry for the more of 150 thousand deaths.
